Params: {2: 'Gang Leader', 3: 'Why... I had the upper hand this time...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Commandant, how about saying a famous line to him?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "See, he's having a slow and bitter death. If you as the protagonist say that famous line, maybe the movie can come to a perfect end!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'As such, you say to the Gang Leaderâ€”'}
{2: 'Buildings burn, people die, but love is forever.', 3: '13', 4: "It can't rain all the time.", 5: '13'}
{3: 'He also collapses right in front of you, turning into ashes that slowly disintegrate in the rain.'}
{3: 'Kamui eagerly pulls it out, opening it as Ayla did.'}
{3: 'Stage 2... If you can see this note, at least you have realized that movies have no fixed pattern. You must learn to be flexible.'}
{3: 'Immediately afterward, you fall into darkness again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "I think I'm starting to figure this out...", 4: '1'}
